publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-231 Malcolm Chisholm: The Draft Mental Health (Care and Treatment) (Scotland) Act 2003 (Consequential Modification) Order 2003-That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Care and Treatment) (Scotland) Act 2003 (Consequential Modification) Order 2003 be approved. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe*
